conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch global
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/user/health-monitor-5xx'
| align rate(1m)
| group_by [], sum(value)
| every 1m
| condition val() > 0

documentation.content:
# Runbook
1. Check Cloud Run *Requests* and *Application* logs
2. Inspect latest deploys & revisions
3. Hit `/` `/run_auto_infra_check` `/auto_heal` `/debug/sleep`
4. If repeated 5xx: roll back last revision
